snippet: Bolivian President Evo Morales has been treated for a sore throat in Cuba and will stay on the Caribbean island for several days of medical observation, Bolivia's Vice President and acting head of state Alvaro Garcia Linera said on Thursday....

headline.main: Eight-Year-Old Canadian Goalie's Dance Moves Go Viral
headline.print_headline: Eight-Year-Old Canadian Goalie's Dance Moves Go Viral

lead_paragraph: Bolivian President Evo Morales has been treated for a sore throat in Cuba and will stay on the Caribbean island for several days of medical observation, Bolivia's Vice President and acting head of state Alvaro Garcia Linera said on Thursday.
